title: wine_Sugrue_Pierre_Ltd._2010_The_Trouble_with_Dreams_Sparkling_(England)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 60002.
country: England.
description: Beautifully delineated fruit constitues the nose, with ripe, yellow plum playing alongside crisp, green apple. The palate layers a sonorous tone of sourdough bread with rich hints of yeast, green-apple briskness and gentle yellow plum. The notions unite with the fizzing, fine mousse. On the midpalate and the finish, the depth of this wine becomes clear: Profound and rich but in a totally slender, unassuming and convincing fashion. The finish is pure and lasting. Drink 2017–2027..
designation: The Trouble with Dreams.
points: 95.
price: 80.0.
province: England.
region_1: .
region_2: .
taster_name: Anne Krebiehl MW.
taster_twitter_handle: @AnneInVino.
title: Sugrue Pierre Ltd. 2010 The Trouble with Dreams Sparkling (England).
variety: Sparkling Blend.
